question: Which of the following bills introduced foster care in India?
option1: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2000
option2: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2005
option3: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2010
option4: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015
answer: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015
explanation: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015 introduced foster care in India. Families who sign up for foster care for abandoned, orphaned children, or those in conflict with the law will have such children sent to them.
